Detailed Description

Class used to define the direction configuration for a reader with direction or location role capabilities.

◆ DiagnosticReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.DiagnosticReportEnabled
getset

Enables or disables the diagnostic report.

◆ EnabledSectorIDs

List<ushort> Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.EnabledSectorIDs
getset

Adds the list of sectors that should be monitored for tag entrances, exits, and updates.

◆ EntryReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.EntryReportEnabled
getset

When enabled, an entry report is sent immediately upon the tag entering the field of view of the reader.

◆ ExitReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.ExitReportEnabled
getset

When enabled, an exit report is generated when the tag has not been seen by the reader in the tag age Interval.

◆ FieldOfView

DirectionFieldOfView Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.FieldOfView
getset

Sets the field of view for tag direction tracking.

◆ MaxTxPower

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.MaxTxPower
getset

If true, the reader will make antennas use their maximum transmit power. If false, the TxPowerInDbm value will be used as the antenna transmit power.

◆ Mode

DirectionMode Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.Mode
getset

The performance/sensitivity mode enabled for this direction reporting session.

◆ TagAgeIntervalSeconds

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.TagAgeIntervalSeconds
getset

The "age interval" specifies how long a tag needs to go unseen before it's removed from the population of tags tracked for direction and an exit report is sent.

◆ TagPopulationLimit

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.TagPopulationLimit
getset

Enables or disables the diagnostic report.

◆ TxPowerInDbm

double Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.TxPowerInDbm
getset

Sets the antenna transmit power in dbm

◆ UpdateIntervalSeconds

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.UpdateIntervalSeconds
getset

Specifies how often update reports are sent when updates are enabled. This method sets that interval to the desired value in seconds.

◆ UpdateReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.DirectionConfig.UpdateReportEnabled
getset

When update reports are enabled, direction reports are sent by the reader periodically for all tags in the direction database
